name: Snickers Candy Bar-Apple Salad
author: Denise Pepin Chicago, IL

ingredients.name: (4 to 6) Granny Smith apples, cored, peeled and chopped
full size Snickers candy bars, chopped
oz. container frozen whipped topping, thawed

instructions:
Blend cream cheese and brown sugar together; fold in apples and candy bars. Gently stir in whipped topping.

Tastes just like a caramel apple!
